comment: Using the word 'nigger' to describe someone you don't like isn't mature. Try using a word that isn't slander.
amr:
# ::snt Using the word 'nigger' to describe someone you don't like isn't mature. Try using a word that isn't slander.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (m2 / mature-02
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (u / use-01
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (w / word
                        :mod (n / nigger))
                  :ARG2 (d / describe-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 (s / someone
                              :ARG1-of (d2 / dislike-01
                                    :ARG0 y)))))
      :snt2 (t / try-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (u2 / use-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (w2 / word
                        :ARG0-of (s2 / slander-01
                              :polarity -)))))
